name: ROTOR LOW
description:
Rotor under-speed.
Rotor speed more than 2% below the datum set by the FCS system (Power ON).
Rotor speed below 90% (Power OFF).

procedure.text: + Audio tone and 'ROTOR LOW ROTOR LOW' voice warning.
1. Collective â€” Adjust to increase the rotor speed.
Refer to Engine Emergency and Malfunction drills if relevant.
